          <script language="javascript">
           function openForgotPasswordWindow()
         {
         var newWin
         newWin = window.open("../bsmart/BSmartFreeHtmls/BSmartPassword.aspx","passwordwindow","toolbar=0,statusbar=0,addressbar=0,width=310,height=274,top=" + (screen.height/2 - 120)  + ",left=" + (screen.width/2 - 160) + ",resizable=0,scrollbars=0");
         newWin.focus();
         }
         function createRedirectURL()
 
         {
 
         var url="signup.aspx"
 
         var returnpage=getUrlParam('returnpage')
 
         if (returnpage) url=url+"?returnpage="+returnpage
 
         return url;
 
         }
 
         function createRedirectURLlogout()
 
         {
 
         var url="home.aspx?action=logout"
         var returnpage=getUrlParam('returnpage')
 
         if (returnpage) url=url+"?returnpage="+returnpage
         return url;
 
         }
          </script>
          <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="margin-right:16px;">

              <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
               var VBSmartMenu1 = new BsmartMenu('VBSmartMenu1',false,false,false);VBSmartMenu1.ShadowColor = 'Black';
       /*
       1 - name of Root menu
       2 -
       3 - overlay (true,false)-Set this attribute to True, if you need to display the menu over windowed objects.
       menu can be displayed over IE windowed objects, i.e. HTML select boxes, Flash animations, etc
       4 - outputCacheMode
       */
              </script>

                             <img alt="" src="design/images/pixel.gif"/>
                            </td>
                           </tr>
                          </table>
                         </td>
                         <td width="3">
                         </td>

              <tr>
               <td class="paddingHomeCenter">
                <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P27" id="P27" style="direction:rtl;">
                 <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                   <td>
                    <div class="editor_text" id="BSText12697_27_BSTEXT">
                     <span style="font-size: 12pt; color: #366092;">
                      <strong>
                       <span style="font-size: 12pt;">
                        <p style="text-align: center;">
                         <iframe frameborder="0" height="300" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/3oF-51Pyec0?autoplay=1" width="400">
                         </iframe>
                        </p>
                        <div style="text-align: justify;">
                         <img alt="" src="/Media/Image/6.jpg" style="top: 1686px; width: 530px; height: 399px;"/>
                        </div>
                        <p style="text-align: center;">
                        </p>
                        <table style="width: 530px; height: 107px; top: 2196px;">
                         <tbody>
                          <tr>
                           <td>
                           </td>
                          </tr>
                          <tr>
                           <td>
                            <p style="text-align: center;">
                             <span style="font-family: arial;">
                              <span style="color: #366092;">
                               <strong>
                                בית מתכת בע"מ - Beth Matechet Ltd
                                <br/>
                               </strong>
                               <br/>
                              </span>
                              <span style="font-size: 9pt;">
                               <span style="color: #244061;">
                                יוסף קארו 32 תל-אביב 67014 טל': 03-5626685 פקס': 03-5626985
                               </span>
                               <br/>
                               <span style="font-size: 9pt;">
                                32Joseph Karo st. Tel-Aviv 67014  Tel:972-3-5626685  Fax:972-3-5626985
                               </span>
                              </span>
                             </span>
                            </p>
                           </td>
                          </tr>
                         </tbody>
                        </table>
                       </span>
                      </strong>
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                 </table>
                </div>
               </td>
              </tr>
             </table>
            </td>
            <td class="left_side">
             <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
              <tr>
               <td valign="top">
                <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P3333" id="P3333" style="direction:rtl;">
                 <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                   <td>
                    <div class="editor_text" id="BSText18549_3333_BSTEXT">
                     <img alt="" src="/Media/Image/hazmana.gif"/>
                    </div>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                 </table>
                </div>
               </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
               <td valign="top">
                <div data-new_design_style="False" data-panel_used_gui="P333" id="P333" style="direction:rtl;">
                 <script type="text/javascript">
                  function addsameorder()
       {
       var listdetails=itemdetails();
 
       listdetails=listdetails.slice(0, -3);
       var address;
       address='small_cart.aspx?bsprlist=' + listdetails;
       document.getElementById('iframecart').src=address;
       document.getElementById('makat').value= "";
       document.getElementById('kamut').value= "";
       }
                 </script>
                 <script type="text/javascript">
                  function itemdetails(){
       var details='';
       details=details + document.getElementById('makat').value+'|,|'+document.getElementById('kamut').value+'|,|';
       return details;
       }
                 </script>
                 <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:179px;height:130px;float:right;" width="100%">
                  <tr>
                   <td align="right" style="background-image:url('design/images/leftSide_continu.gif');background-repeat: repeat-y;width:179px;height:117px;padding-top:10px;padding-right:5px;">
                    <form method="post" name="quick_cart">
                     <table border="0" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2" class="normal">
                      <tr>
                       <td>
                        <b>
                         מק"ט
                        </b>
                       </td>
                       <td>
                        <input id="makat" maxlength="30" style="width:70px" type="text"/>
                       </td>
                      </tr>
                      <tr>
                       <td>
                        <b>
                         כמות
                        </b>
                       </td>
                       <td align="right">
                        <input id="kamut" maxlength="30" style="width:70px" type="text"/>
                       </td>
                      </tr>
                      <tr>
                       <td>
                       </td>
                       <td align="right">
                        <img alt="" onclick="addsameorder()" src="design/images/buy.gif" style="cursor:pointer;"/>
                       </td>
                      </tr>
                     </table>
                    </form>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                   <td align="right" colspan="2" style="padding-right:0px;">

                 <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
                  function playdellay2(param1)
 		{
 			document.all("scroll1").scrollAmount=3
 		}
 		
 		function stopdellay2(param1)
 		{
 			document.all("scroll1").scrollAmount=0
 		}
                 </script>
